GeneralNotes: **I suspect these are the inspiration for Usurarum Voraginem**
issued by Pierre de Charny † (1267 - agosto 1274); according to Frowein, Episkopat, 320
-brief bio sketch in Fasti, t. 11, pp117-19, where it notes that the date of his death varies from 8/16/21 August 1274;
Charny as also 'camerier du pape' under Urban IV and Clement IV; from August 1262 to at least Oct 1267 he resided at the papal court and managed important financial transactions (Fasti, 11, 117)
